definitions.definition: A mountebank , someone who addresses crowds in the street; ( especially ) , an itinerant seller of medicines or drugs .
A malicious trickster ; a fake person, especially one who deceives for personal profit.

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A mountebank , someone who addresses crowds in the street; ( especially ) , an itinerant seller of medicines or drugs .
secondary_definitions: A malicious trickster ; a fake person, especially one who deceives for personal profit.
